parameters:
"Hmm... I wonder if there's a reason this cake is placed
here."

"I thought it was a real cake, but it looks like a food
sample. But why is something like this placed here?"
"I can't believe this was a hint for the password..."
"Hmm... I'm somehow intrigued by this alphabet chart..."

"I thought it was a calendar, but it looks like an alphabet
chart. I had something similar at my house. Brings back
memories."
"I can't believe this was a hint for the password..."

"There seems to be something placed up there... Ah, if I use
the stepladder from earlier as a foothold."

"What's this, a box? The contents look like tools. They
might come in handy, so I'll take them with me."

"It looks like there's something placed up there, but I
can't reach it at this height. I should look for something
that could serve as a foothold."

"There seems to be something placed up there... Ah, if I use
the ladder from earlier as a foothold."

"What's this, a box? The contents look like tools. They seem
useful, so I'll take them with me."

"It looks like there's something placed up there, but I
can't reach it at this height. I should look for something
that can be used as a foothold."
